data.title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye Westâ€™s Relationship: A Complete Timeline
data.meta_description: A complete timeline of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's relationshipâ€”from friendship to dating to marriage and kids, to an ongoing divorce.
data.text:
Kim Kardashian and Kanye Westâ€™s relationship dates all the way back to the early aughts, long before they started dating, got married, and had four childrenâ€”North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalmâ€”together.

But their relationship has been changing in the face of the unraveling of their marriage. Letâ€™s go back to the beginning and trace how we got here with Kim Kardashian and Kanye West.

2002â€“2003

Kardashian and West first meet around this time, when she had yet to become a household name. â€œI met him I think in 2002 or 2003,â€ Kardashian told Ryan Seacrest during the Keeping Up With the Kardashians 10th anniversary special, per Us Weekly. â€œHe was recording a song with Brandy, and I was her friend. I vividly remember hanging out with him and then they did a video together, so Iâ€™d see him a few times. He was asking his friends: â€˜Who is this Kim Kardajan?â€™ He didnâ€™t know what my name was.â€

2008

Kardashian and West appear together in a Star Warsâ€“themed video in which she dressed as Princess Leia and he was a Storm Trooper. She shared some photos on her now defunct personal website, writing in 2015, â€œIn honor of Star Wars: The Force Awakens being released today, I wanted to share these old pics of Kanye and me from years ago! We worked together on a pilot for a show called Alligator Boots back in 2008, and I played Princess Leia.â€

2011

Kardashian actually marries Kris Humphries on August 11 of this year, but they split a mere 72 days later. (They didnâ€™t legally reach a divorce settlement until 2013.) But all roads led back to West.

â€œRight before I got married to Kris Humphries, [Kanye and I] were talking and I just went a different direction,â€ she said during the KUWTK anniversary special. â€œI think I had to go through that to figure out what I wanted. After my breakup, I was feeling really low and down, and he said, â€˜Just come to Paris and see my fashion show.â€™ He jokes that he put on this whole fashion show just to get a date with me. So I went there and I stayed with him, and thatâ€™s where we started dating. I swear from the moment I landed, I fell madly in love with him and I thought, Oh, my God, why didnâ€™t I do this sooner? Like, this is what real life is likeâ€”love and fun and real support.â€

2013

Their first child, daughter North West, is born on June 15, 2013.

West proposes to Kardashian in October. The location? A huge, vacant baseball stadium. The method? A Jumbotron message that read, â€œPleeease marry meee!!!â€ Also, a live orchestra, because of course!

Then, in the second part of the finale, which aired on June 10, she opens up to her mom. â€œI just feel like Iâ€™ve worked so hard in life to achieve everything that Iâ€™ve wanted to, and Iâ€™ve lived up to my expectations and achieved 10 times more than I ever thought was humanly possible, but I donâ€™t have a life to share that with,â€ she tells Kris Jenner, per Us Weekly. â€œLike, I doâ€”obviously my kids and everythingâ€”but am I just going to sit here and think, â€˜OK, my kids fulfill me and Iâ€™m good?â€™â€

Ultimately, she wanted something more intimate with her partner than a series of grand gestures. â€œAfter turning 40 this year, I realized like, â€˜No, I donâ€™t want a husband that lives in a completely different state,â€™â€ she continued. â€œTo me, I thought, â€˜Oh, my God, thatâ€™s when weâ€™re getting along the best,â€™ but then that is sad to me and thatâ€™s not what I want. I want someone that we have the same shows in common. I want someone who wants to work out with me.â€

In fact, it was her sisterâ€™s relationship that opened her eyes during the pandemic. â€œLike, every single day KhloÃ© and Tristan and I would work out at 6 a.m., the three of us, and I was third-wheeling it for a good eight months in quarantine and I was so envious of that,â€ Kardashian said. â€œI was like, â€˜Wow, itâ€™s, like, the little things I donâ€™t have.â€™ I have all the big things. I have the extravagant everything you can possibly imagine and no one will ever do it like thatâ€”I know that and Iâ€™m grateful for those experiencesâ€”but I think Iâ€™m ready for the smaller experiences that I think will mean a lot.â€

On Kanyeâ€™s 44th birthday, June 8, Kardashian posted a picture to Instagram of herself, West, and three of their children on a private plane. In the caption, she wrote, â€œHappy Birthday Love U for Life! ğŸˆâ€ That same day West was spotted with Irina Shayk. (Hereâ€™s everything we know about that.)

August 2021: On August 26, Kardashian appears at Westâ€™s third Donda listening event. While she had attended the first two with their children, this time sparked serious reconciliation rumors when she appeared to recreate her 2014 wedding with West in a full wedding gown and veil.

X content

This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.

The questions surrounding their current relationship status are strengthened by reports that Kardashian is not planning to remove â€œWestâ€ from her legal name. However, sources tell People that the couple is not getting back together.

â€œThe thing thatâ€™s important is itâ€™s not at all about them getting back together or something like that,â€ a source told the publication. â€œItâ€™s really just kind of this more holistic sense of love as a healing force.â€

Previously, another source told People that the two are in a solid place as business partners and friends. â€œKim and Kanye have a friendly relationship. Itâ€™s always been important to Kim to have a good relationship with Kanye. They are not getting back together, though,â€ the source said. â€œKim still appreciates Kanyeâ€™s business advice and guidance. She is happy that they can hang out.â€

October 2021: On October 6, Kardashian jokes about their split while hosting SNL. â€œIâ€™ve been very blessed in this life, and Iâ€™m grateful for everything, honestly, all the ups, all the downs,â€ Kardashian began. â€œI mean, I married the best rapper of all time. Not only that, heâ€™s the richest Black man in America, a talented, legit genius, who gave me four incredible kids.â€

She continued, â€œSo when I divorced him, you have to know it came down to just one thing: his personality.â€

November 2021: Following that stint on SNL, Kardashian is spotted on multiple outings with comedian Pete Davidson. Despite those relationship rumors, West revealed on November 4 that he wants his â€œwifeâ€ back. â€œSNL making my wife say â€˜I divorced himâ€™ on TV because they just wanted to get that bar off,â€ West said on the Drink Champs podcast, per People. â€œAnd I ainâ€™t never even seen the papers, weâ€™re not even divorced.â€

He later added, â€œThat ainâ€™t no joke to me. My kids want their parents to stay together. I wantâ€¦us to be together.â€

On November 6, Cosmo reported that Kanye West has unfollowed Kardashian on Instagram. According to Page Six, this is the second time he's done so this month.

As Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson confirm their relationship in late November, West continues to speak publicly about his wish to reconcile. â€œThe narrative God wants is to see that we can be redeemed in all these relationships,â€ West said during the charity event on November 24, per People. â€œWeâ€™ve made mistakes. Iâ€™ve made mistakes. Iâ€™ve publicly done things that were not acceptable as a husband, but right now today, for whatever reasonâ€”I didnâ€™t know I was going to be in front of this micâ€”but Iâ€™m here to change the narrative.â€

While denouncing the narrative pushed by Keeping Up With the Kardashians networks Hulu and E!, West added, â€œIf the enemy can separate Kimye, thereâ€™s going to be millions of families that feel like that separation is okayâ€¦but when God brings Kimye together, thereâ€™s going to be millions of families that are going to be influenced to see that they can overcome the work of the separation, of trauma the devil has used to capitalize to keep people in misery while people step over homeless people to go to the Gucci store.â€

According to People, West also shared that heâ€™s moved into a house near his family, he feels he â€œneeds to be back home.â€

December 2021: Kardashian gives West a shout-out at the 2021 Peopleâ€™s Choice Awards while accepting the Fashion Icon Award. â€œTo Kanye, for really introducing me to the fashion world,â€ she said, per Bustle. â€œI fell in love with fashion and Iâ€™m so inspired by so many people, but again, this is like a dream that I get to wake up and wear these amazing clothes and try new things and take a risk. Iâ€™m so humbled.â€

On December 9, West calls for reconciliation once again. While performing the song â€œRunawayâ€ at the Free Larry Hoover concert in Los Angeles, West sings the lyrics â€œI need you to run right back to me, baby,â€ before adding, â€œmore specifically, Kimberly.â€ According to People, Kardashian is in the audience with eight-year-old North and six-year-old Saint.

However, on December 10, according to court documents obtained by TMZ, Kardashian reportedly files to be declared legally single and to have her maiden name restored, officially dropping â€œWestâ€ from her legal name. If signed off by the judge, their marital status will be separated from issues of custody and divisions of assets and property.

On December 27, it's reported that Kanye West recently purchased a house directly across the street from the KKW Beauty founder. According to the Daily Mail, West pays $4.5 million for a â€œrelatively modestâ€ estate in Hidden Hills, which is near the mansion he and Kardashian owned before she bought out his half for $23 million in October.

West even reportedly pays $421,000 over the asking price for the home, which Dirt describes as â€œarchitecturally unremarkable,â€ with four bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms, and a guest studio that has another room and bath attached to the garage.

2022

January 2022: A lot can change in a month. By January 2022, Kanye West is dating actor Julia Foxâ€”a relationship Kardashian reportedly supports. However, despite Westâ€™s describing his relationship with his ex as â€œthe best divorce ever,â€ things are starting to get a bit messy.

For one, West says that in a song that took shots at his ex as well as Davidson. â€œGod saved me from that crash just so I can beat Pete Davidson's ass,â€ West raps in â€œEazy,â€ according to People. He also throws shade at Kardashian's parenting skills: â€œI got love for the nannies, but real family is better. The cameras watch the kids, y'all stop takin' the credit,â€ he raps. â€œNon-custodial dad, I bought the house next door. What you think the point of really bein' rich for.â€

He adds, â€œBoujee and unruly, y'all need to do some chores. Rich ass kids, this ain't yo mama's house.â€

Around the same time as the song drops on January 14, West is also complaining in interviews that he is not allowed to enter his ex's home to see his children. However, sources tell People that these claims are â€œfalseâ€ and Kardashian is simply setting â€œhealthy boundariesâ€ after a number of â€œrecent unannounced visitsâ€ led to issues with her family, friends, and staff.

â€œHe just can no longer walk inside her home without her permission,â€ the source says, adding that Kardashian â€œhas a right to privacy and is trying to set healthy boundaries.â€

On January 15, however, West is spotted at his daughter Chicago's fourth-birthday party after sharing a live video claiming he wasn't given the address. â€œYaâ€™ll, Iâ€™m just wishing my daughter a public happy birthday,â€ West says, per BET. â€œI wasnâ€™t allowed to know where her party was.â€

After attending, West posts another video, thanking Travis Scott for sharing the address and letting him in.

February 2022: On February 13, the day of the Super Bowl, West posts on Instagram about his displeasure with his ex's relationship with Davidson.

Then on Valentine's Day, February 14, his split from Fox becomes official, and he sends a truckload of roses to Kim.

On February 15, after deleting his previous Instagram posts, West writes, â€œIâ€™ve learned that using all caps makes people feel like Iâ€™m screaming at them. Iâ€™m working on my communication. I can benefit from a team of creative professionals, organizers, mobilizers and community leaders. Thank everybody for supporting me. I know sharing screen shots was jarring and came off as harassing Kim. I take accountability. Iâ€™m still learning in real time. I donâ€™t have all the answers. To be good leader is to be a good listener.â€

After nearly a week of posting and deleting Instagrams about Kardashian and Davidson, Kanye is attempting to block his ex from obtaining a legal divorce and restoring her maiden name. According to court documents obtained by People on February 19, the rapper filed a response to Kardashian's December petition to be declared â€œlegally single.â€

In the response, West's lawyers suggest that declaring Kardashian single status before the terms of their divorce (i.e., custody, division of assets, etc.) are finalized could have â€œa risk of adverse consequencesâ€ and â€œcreates barriers to obtaining evidenceâ€ should one of the parties â€œremarries before the case is concluded.â€

West's lawyers also lay out a series of â€œconditionsâ€ for Kardashian if she wants West to reconsider, which you can read more about here.

On February 23, Kardashian's legal team asks the court to reject West's attempts to delay the divorce, according to legal documents obtained by People. They once again ask for Kardashian to be declared legally single, citing West's social media posts as a cause for concern.

â€œSince filing for divorce, Mr. West, by his actions, has made it clear that he does not accept that the parties' marital relationship is over,â€ the documents state. â€œMr. West has disseminated on social media the parties' private communications and misinformation about personal family matters and coparenting, which has caused emotional distress.â€

Included in the filing is a declaration from Kardashian herself. â€œI very much desire to be divorced,â€ she writes, in part. â€œI have asked Kanye to keep our divorce private, but he has not done so. Kanye has been putting a lot of misinformation regarding our private family matters and coparenting on social media. While I wish our marriage would have succeeded, I have come to the realization that there is no way to repair our marriage.â€
